values.text: I don't quite understand your request, please choose from these options before you asks something

As in [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vainglory_(video_game))

Vainglory is a free-to-play video game with in-game purchases, developed and published by Super Evil Megacorp for iOS, Android and PC. The game is a version of the MOBA wherein two opposing teams of three or five players fight to destroy the enemy by controlling the path between the bases, which is lined by turrets and guarded by AI-controlled enemy creatures called minions. Off the path, players battle for control points that provide resources. The game was released for iOS on November 16, 2014, after being soft-launched for over half a year, with the Android version being released on July 2, 2015. A Mac and Microsoft Windows version of the game was released in July 2018. Through cross-platform play, players on all four platforms can play together simultaneously.

The game's development started in 2012 upon the forming of Super Evil Megacorp. The game was unveiled at Apple's September 2014 iPhone 6 announcement event to demonstrate the platform's Metal graphics API. Super Evil Megacorp attempted to make a game that would entertain players for hours and encourage in-person multiplayer experiences similar to that of a LAN party.

Vainglory received generally favorable reviews. Critics praised the game's graphics, characters, and level design, but criticized its lack of team communication features. Reviewers disagreed on the game's degree of accessibility to newcomers, which was part of the reason why it received mixed reviews.

A grand comeback is unlikely but SEMC is slowly working towards the Community Edition that they promised us. We have been stuck at [stage 1B](http://vainglorygame.com/news/vainglory-community-edition) since ~3 years ago. See this [response](https://twitter.com/TeamBubbleland/status/1583371844367060993) by Vainglory developer.

Account, party, rank, and chat are gone. All cosmetics and talents are unlocked for everyone. It is still possible to â€œpartyâ€ and play with your friends with by sniping or using the code system. For more details, continue reading or visit our [Play Together](https://bubbleland.org/play-together) article and this [guide](https://www.everlastingnight.org/954/new-party-code-feature-to-chose-sides/).

If your screen freezes, people assumption so far is that the issue caused by internet problem, specifically using Indihome as their internet service provider. After back-end update of Vainglory, people think that Indihome doesn't want to connect to Vainglory's server. Even that developer does not claim this reasoning yet, it is actually quite reasonable since people solved this issue by changing their internet or Wi-Fi

To play together, you have so snipe your friends. Sniping refers to queuing with your friends at the same time in order to get into the same match. To be in the same team, you can use the â€œpartyâ€ code system explained below. Sniping servers are Discord servers made for playing Vainglory together.
To be in team A, prepend 1200-1_ to your IGN/username and ask your friends to do the same, e.g.
â€‡â€‡1200-1_MarViels
â€‡â€‡1200-1_gemmeg
Start the queue and you will end up in Team A. Using 1200-2_ will put you in Team B. For full private party, use a number above 3000, e.g.
â€‡â€‡3333-1_TeamAâ€‡â€‡3333-2_TeamB
â€‡â€‡3333_AnyTeam

Yes, with a VPN. Ignore the dropdown menu in game because it is broken. Set the desired region for your VPN and turn it on before opening Vainglory. Expect suboptimal ping. Some players report better ping when they turn off the VPN after the draft phase.

Vainglory features three primary roles: laner, jungler, and captain.
The laner focuses on farming and pushing the lane, the jungler clears neutral jungle camps and assists in ganking, and the captain supports the team with crowd control and utility.

Yes, with a VPN. Ignore the dropdown menu in game because it is broken. Set the desired region for your VPN and turn it on before opening Vainglory. Expect suboptimal ping. Some players report better ping when they turn off the VPN after the draft phase.

On the latest version of Vainglory on Android and iOS, you can use both skins and talents. To use them on PC, you have to configure some files connecting mobile device to computer device. For more explanation, you can find it [here](https://bubbleland.org/how-to-use-skins#Windows)

After Back-end update of Vainglory, some people indeed experiencing connection issues such as high ping, wifi issues (ASAP in home screen), etc. Unfortunately, this issues is currently being fix by developer and what we can do is using proper internet connection.

To run Vainglory on PC, you need to meet the following minimum system requirements:
Operating System: Windows 7 or later, or macOS 10.11 or later.
Processor: Dual-core CPU with 1.8 GHz or higher.
Memory: 4 GB RAM or higher.
Graphics: DirectX 11-compatible graphics card with at least 1 GB VRAM.
Storage: 2 GB available space.
It's nice to meet you!

Good heroes for new learners are Ringo, Koshka, and Catherine. For more early recommended heroes, you can try ask your friends and people in communities since they know more about the meta at their time.

You can download the Windows client from our [Download Vainglory page](https://bubbleland.org/download-vainglory). Due to a bug, you will still need the help of iOS or Android version to queue. Follow this [guide](https://bubbleland.org/how-to-use-skins#windows). There is no working macOS client for now. New PC and Mac versions will be released with the [next update](https://discord.com/channels/164080359871348736/762788445135306762/1063475275045810256).
